attributes.action: Admit that the war in Iraq (and our wider foreign policy) has directly increased the terrorist threat to the UK and will lead to more unnecessary deaths of British civilians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone with an ounce of commonsense, will be aware that our countries actions have caused people, who would normally be peaceful people, to have such great concern for their religion/family/country, that they have taken to arms and attacked the British civilian population.

Would you expect British expatriates agree with their host country to an attack on the UK?
